title: The Eyes have it
creator_contributor_role: National Society for the Prevention of Blindness, production company

description: Marionettes led by an owl accompanied by a piano playing fox and the fern forest orchestra sing a song of advice about eye care. Other marionettes act out the words of the song. Later the song is repeated, with some different activities while the words are flashed on the screen.
